author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 21-day refresher course for college and university teachers began at the UGC Human Resource Centre of the Bharathidasan University in Khajamalai campus on Wednesday.

V.M. Muthukumar, Vice-Chancellor, said a total of 80 participants from different parts of the country had taken part in the course, which was aimed at updating the recent developments in physics, political science, public administration and history. They would also be informed about the emerging trends in their respective fields. It would facilitate the participants to enrich their knowledge and skills. E. Ram Ganesh, Director, UGC Human Resource Centre, said arrangements had been made to bring renowned resource persons to deliver lectures and impart training to the participants. It would continue until March 8.
title: Refresher course begins at BDU
